Uses of Class
osyfe.graphic.util.Font

  • Packages that use Font 
    Package Description
    osyfe.graphic.util
    Contains graphics utilities such as cameras, text rendering and basic shape generation.
    osyfe.gui
    Provides standard gui elements with automatic input handling and rendering.

    • Uses of Font in osyfe.graphic.util

      Fields in osyfe.graphic.util declared as Font 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Font Text.font
      The font used by this text's.
      Constructors in osyfe.graphic.util with parameters of type Font 
      Constructor and Description
      Text(Font font, float width, float lineHeight, java.lang.String... text)
      default: align = ALIGN_LEFT.
      Text(Font font, float lineHeight, java.lang.String... text)
      default: align = ALIGN_LEFT, width = Float.MAX_VALUE.
      Text(Font font, Text.Align align, float width, float lineHeight, java.lang.String... texts)
      Creates a new list of texts. width and lineHeight are interpreted in screen coordinates.
